title: (x) Serifs of Love - Caslon 540 {Yves}
content:
The three small lines at the bottom look like Baskerville to me, but what of the rest? I believe this was published in 1973 in England.   
   
(I apologize for the huge image -- I'd shrink it if there were any image editing software on the dingy little public computer I'm on.)   
   
 ![Politics of love](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108213405im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/41367.jpg)
author: figbash_acrobat

comments.content: Now _that_ is a huge Caslon; the italic reminds me of the [540 cut](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108213405/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/caslon-540/).
